verbose_text: However, of the detergents tested, only TTX promoted binding of FITC-LPS to the target peptide / protein immobilized in the ELISA plate and, as expected, this effect only occurred at concentrations equal to or exceeding the CMC (Figs XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG), which is necessary for a detergent to be capable of solubilizing amphipathic molecules [XREF_BIBR].
